akn:content.akn:p: §§ 1456 to 1460. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Sections were omitted pursuant to section 5316 of this title which terminated authority to make grants or loans under this subchapter after Jan. 1, 1975. Section 1456, acts July 15, 1949, ch. 338, title I, § 106, 63 Stat. 417; June 3, 1952, ch. 362, 66 Stat. 98; June 30, 1953, ch. 170, § 22, 67 Stat. 127; Aug. 2, 1954, ch. 649, title III, § 308, title VIII, § 802(e), 68 Stat. 625, 643; Aug. 11, 1955, ch. 783, title I, § 106(b), 69 Stat. 637; Aug. 7, 1956, ch. 1029, title III, §§ 304, 305, 70 Stat. 1100; July 12, 1957, Pub.
